name: Toy Egg Surprise Maker - Surprise Eggs
name_original: Toy Egg Surprise Maker - Surprise Eggs
description:
Have you ever wanted to create your very own Toy Egg Surprise and get your family and friends to unbox it?
Well now you can!

***HOW TO PLAY***

Pick a toy to hid inside your surprise egg then pick a cool foil wrapper to encase your yummy chocolate egg in.

Then design the display box to put your egg surprise in. From the color to the shape of the box window, it can all be customized. There are even different signs to put on the box so you can make your toy egg surprise for a, special occasion, Easter, Christmas and Birthdays are all covered.

Once you're finished with the look of your toy egg surprise box you can then decorate it with a choice of tons of stickers. Change the paint color and size of stickers to get it just right.

Let your imagination run wild and come up with as many cute, cool, crazy ideas as you can.


**FEATURES**

* Save your favourite creations to be opened whenever you want!
* Show it off to your family and friends then get them to open it.
* Unbox it yourself like your favourite online video unboxing collectors.

Toy Egg Surprise is great fun for all ages and suitable for both boys and girls.


Toy Egg Surprise is totally free and does not contain any in-app purchases.
This is the full app and all the items are unlocked.
